Title: The first snow fell in the Carpathians: photos
Description: The first snow fell in the Carpathians: photosThe first snow fell in the highlands of the Carpathians on September 30. Snow was recorded in the Dragobrat resort, Pozhyzhevska valley and Mount Pip Ivan, where the temperature was -5Â°C.

Title: All components of the Defense Forces control the entire length of...
Description: All components of the Defense Forces control the entire length of the border with Belarus - State Border Guard ServiceA spokesperson for the State Border Guard Service reported that the border with Belarus was controlled by the Ukrainian Defense Forces.

Title: The far-right gained success in the Austrian elections
Description: The far-right gained success in the Austrian electionsIn the Austrian parliamentary elections, the far-right FPÃ party won 29.2% of the vote. This opens up the possibility of forming a new coalition, as the Conservative-Green alliance is on the verge of collapse.

Title: Russia's attack on the Kyiv region: the consequences are shown
Description: Russia's attack on the Kyiv region: the consequences are shownOn September 30, the aggressor attacked Kyiv region, damaging residential buildings. A house caught fire in one of the districts, the fire was localized. There is no information about the victims.

Title: Missile and 'Shahed' were shot down in Dnipropetrovs'k region at ...
Description: Missile and 'Shahed' were shot down in Dnipropetrovs'k region at night, enemy shelled Nikopol and two communitiesAn enemy missile and a shahed were destroyed in Dnipropetrovs'k region. Nikopol district was shelled by Grad, artillery and drones, and buildings and infrastructure were damaged. Kryvyi Rih observes a day of mourning for the dead.

Title: MES on abolition of gold and silver medals in schools: discussion...
Description: MES on abolition of gold and silver medals in schools: discussions are underwayThe Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine has announced that it is discussing the abolition of awarding gold and silver medals to students. The Education Ombudsman proposes to revise the system of awarding school graduates.

Title: UAV spotted in Kyiv region, air defense system in operation - RMA
Description: UAV spotted in Kyiv region, air defense system in operation - RMAUnmanned aerial vehicles are spotted in the airspace of Kyiv region. Air defense forces are working on targets. People are urged to stay in shelters until the air raid is over.

Title: Kyiv region was attacked by Russian drones at night: debris fell ...
Description: Kyiv region was attacked by Russian drones at night: debris fell in 6 districts, there were fires, a cemetery was damagedThe enemy launched a nighttime drone attack on the Kyiv region. Air defense destroyed all targets, there were no casualties, but the debris caused fires and damage in 6 districts.

Title: Exchange rate as of September 30: National Bank strengthened the ...
Description: Exchange rate as of September 30: National Bank strengthened the hryvniaThe National Bank of Ukraine has set the official hryvnia exchange rate at 41.1664 UAH/USD, which strengthened the hryvnia by 4 kopecks. The euro exchange rate was set at 45.95 UAH/euro.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia region 393 hostile attacks in 24 ours, 16 wounded
Description: In Zaporizhzhia region 393 hostile attacks in 24 ours, 16 woundedOccupants struck 393 times at 10 localities in Zaporizhzhia region over the last day. There were 26 air strikes, 170 UAV attacks, 18 MLRS attacks and 179 artillery attacks, and numerous objects were damaged.

Title: Ukraine's General Staff: 153 combat engagements in the frontline ...
Description: Ukraine's General Staff: 153 combat engagements in the frontline over the last day, the most intense in the Pokrovsk and Kurakhove sectorsOver the last day, 153 combat engagements took place, with the most active fighting in the Pokrovsk and Kurakhove sectors. Russians conducted 88 air strikes and over 4,400 attacks, while the Ukrainian Armed Forces repelled numerous enemy attacks.

Title: Mayor: wreckage of enemy drone found near residential building in...
Description: Mayor: wreckage of enemy drone found near residential building in Obolon district of KyivThe wreckage of an enemy UAV was found near a residential building in Obolon district of Kyiv. All necessary services are working on the spot to resolve the situation.

Title: 8 'Shaheds' shot down in Sumy region, 71 explosions from Russian ...
Description: 8 'Shaheds' shot down in Sumy region, 71 explosions from Russian strikes overnightAt night, 8 enemy Shaheds were shot down over Sumy region. Russians fired 20 times at the border areas and settlements of the region, 71 explosions were recorded in 8 communities.

Title: 67 'Shaheds' and an X-59 missile shot down over Ukraine during Ru...
Description: 67 'Shaheds' and an X-59 missile shot down over Ukraine during Russia's night attackOn the night of September 30, Russia attacked Ukraine with 76 air strikes. The Ukrainian Armed Forces destroyed 67 Shahed drones and an X-59 missile over 11 regions, and the attack on Kyiv lasted more than 5 hours.

Title: Hurricane Helene kills at least 90 people in the United States
Description: Hurricane Helene kills at least 90 people in the United StatesThe Southeast of the United States has begun a large-scale cleanup after Hurricane Helene. The disaster claimed about 90 lives, left millions without power, and caused up to $100 billion in damage.

Title: Three 'Shaheds' destroyed in Mykolaiv region, enemy attacks criti...
Description: Three 'Shaheds' destroyed in Mykolaiv region, enemy attacks critical infrastructureThree Shahed drones were shot down in Mykolaiv region. The enemy attacked the Kutsurub community, damaging houses. A fire broke out at a critical infrastructure facility in Bashtanka district.

Title: Rains and up to 25Â° C: weather forecast for today
Description: Rains and up to 25Â° C: weather forecast for todayRains are expected in western Ukraine today, sometimes heavy. The rest of the country will be mostly dry and warm. In Kyiv, there may be short-term rain at night, no precipitation during the day, the temperature will be 17-19Â°.

Title: Plus 1502 occupants, 5 tanks, 27 artillery systems: General Staff...
Description: Plus 1502 occupants, 5 tanks, 27 artillery systems: General Staff updates data on enemy lossesThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine has updated the data on the losses of the Russian army. Over the past day, about 1,250 soldiers, 5 tanks, 27 artillery systems and other equipment were destroyed. There is one Russian missile carrier in the Black Sea.

Title: The attack on Kyiv lasted more than 5 hours, with no damage or ca...
Description: The attack on Kyiv lasted more than 5 hours, with no damage or casualties in the capitalThe attack by Russian Shahed drones on Kyiv lasted more than 5 hours. According to preliminary reports, all enemy UAVs were destroyed by air defense forces, and there were no damages or casualties in the city.

Title: Russia has one missile carrier in the Black Sea with a total voll...
Description: Russia has one missile carrier in the Black Sea with a total volley of up to 4 'calibers'There is one Russian Kalibr cruise missile carrier ship in the Black Sea with a total volley of up to 4 missiles. In the Mediterranean Sea, there is another ship with 16 Kalibrs.

Title: There is not a single grocery store in more than 200 towns and vi...
Description: There is not a single grocery store in more than 200 towns and villages of the occupied Luhansk region - RMAThere is not a single grocery store in more than 200 occupied towns and villages in Luhansk Oblast. According to the head of the RMA, even in the communities occupied since 2014, infrastructure has not been improved in 10 years.

Title: Guerrillas sabotage railway lines in Kursk region - ATESH
Description: Guerrillas sabotage railway lines in Kursk region - ATESHThe underground movement ATES reported a sabotage on a key railroad line in the Kursk region. The explosion of a relay cabinet will complicate the supply of the Russian army to the front.

Title: Medieval necropolis discovered in the mountains on the border of ...
Description: Medieval necropolis discovered in the mountains on the border of Ingushetia and GeorgiaArchaeologists have discovered a unique necropolis near the Nizhny Pui tower complex in Ingushetia, near the border with Georgia. The discovery may shed light on the historical ties between the Ingush and Georgians.

Title: A whole family was poisoned by carbon monoxide in Ivano-Frankivsk
Description: A whole family was poisoned by carbon monoxide in Ivano-FrankivskIn Ivano-Frankivsk, a mother and three children were poisoned by carbon monoxide and hospitalized. The SES provides advice on how to prevent carbon monoxide poisoning when using gas appliances.

Title: Full-scale war in the Middle East must be avoided - Biden
Description: Full-scale war in the Middle East must be avoided - BidenU.S. President Joe Biden has stated the need to avoid a full-scale war in the Middle East. He plans to hold talks with Israel's Prime Minister, but did not disclose the details of the upcoming conversation.

Title: Train traffic is blocked in Mykolaiv region due to enemy shelling...
Description: Train traffic is blocked in Mykolaiv region due to enemy shelling - UkrzaliznytsiaDue to enemy shelling in Mykolaiv region, the Dolynska - Mykolaiv section is closed to train traffic. The Kyiv - Mykolaiv train will run to Dolynska station, and a bus transfer will be organized for passengers.

Title: Since the beginning of the year, about 7 thousand residents of th...
Description: Since the beginning of the year, about 7 thousand residents of the occupied territories have signed a contract with the Russian army - ResistanceSince the beginning of 2024, about 7,000 residents of the occupied territories of Ukraine have signed a contract with Russian troops. The main reasons are unemployment, difficult financial situation, and Russia's disinformation campaign.

Title: Explosions heard in Kyiv, air defense system in operation
Description: Explosions heard in Kyiv, air defense system in operationA series of explosions are heard in the capital of Ukraine due to air defense operations against enemy 'Shahed' drones. Authorities are urging residents to stay in shelters until the air raid warning goes off.

Title: Taiwan announces full combat readiness due to China's ballistic m...
Description: Taiwan announces full combat readiness due to China's ballistic missile launchThe Taiwanese Defense Ministry has detected 'several waves' of missile launches deep in China and declared full combat readiness. This happened a few days after Beijing announced a successful test of an intercontinental ballistic missile.

Title: Trump calls Harris 'mentally retarded': Republicans criticize for...
Description: Trump calls Harris 'mentally retarded': Republicans criticize former presidentDonald Trump called Vice President Kamala Harris 'mentally retarded'. Several Republicans criticized the former president for these derogatory remarks, urging him to focus on political issues.

Title: German Foreign Minister supports Ukrainian Armed Forces strikes w...
Description: German Foreign Minister supports Ukrainian Armed Forces strikes with long-range weapons on Russian territoryAnnalena Burbock believes that Ukraine should be able to use long-range weapons for self-defense. The minister noted that this is important for overcoming the mine belt in eastern Ukraine.

Title: A world record is set in China - more than 7.5 thousand drones ha...
Description: A world record is set in China - more than 7.5 thousand drones have been launched into the skyChina hosted a drone show that set a new Guinness World Record. 7,598 drones took to the skies simultaneously, creating various images, including a record-breaking image of a tiger that lasted 37 seconds.

Title: Hezbollah elects new leader: what is known
Description: Hezbollah elects new leader: what is knownHashem Safiyeddine became the new leader of Hezbollah after the death of Hassan Nasrallah in an Israeli air strike. Safiyeddine, Nasrallah's cousin, previously headed the group's executive council.

Title: September 30: All-Ukrainian Library Day, International Translatio...
Description: September 30: All-Ukrainian Library Day, International Translation DayOn September 30, Ukraine celebrates the Day of Libraries. The first libraries appeared in Kievan Rus in the 9th and 10th centuries, and today there are about 15,000 library institutions in the country.
